page.title: 11EDUCATIONAL PROVISION(Cont.)
page.content: and hymns are sung.On some occasions stories are told which contain a moral.Varied lessons are taught and much use is made of the school T.V., the computer and educational visits.All these help to make our learning enjoyable.The School has good facilities such as playgrounds,playingfields,a good-sized library and hall. There are many activities in our school including swimming,athletics, crafty club and a bookshop.The P.T.A.organise money raising events each year to help provide additional items for school use which might otherwise not be provided by the Local Education Authority.Every Christmas a big concert is held and the school choir sings carols. { School lunches are taken by a large number of the pupils.They have a
